attributes.action: Free 15 hour childcare for all working parents with a 2 year old
attributes.additional_details:
Currently working parents are having to make choices England parents will no longer have to do.

1) do I give up my career to have children?

2) do I not have children so I can have a career?
attributes.background:
We would like Wales to match the free childcare England will be providing as of April 2024 for 2 year olds and September 2024 for 9 month olds.
This will enable parents to continue with their careers and keep welsh business going.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Welsh Government and Parliament are responsible for.

The Welsh Parliament has its own Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Parliament, you can find out more here: https://petitions.senedd.wales/
